description:
A high-end canoe seat, for deluxe comfort while you paddle. The strong metal frame provides excellent support, and two inches of foam contribute to a cushy ride. Split contoured design even fits plastic moulded seats, and a simple, one-handed device effectively adjusts for your desired level of lounging or support.

  • Adjustable backstrap is 100% nylon
  • Water-resistant exterior fabric
  • Durable powder coat finish resists wear and tear
  • Capacity is 136kg (300lb.) static or sitting weight
name: GCI Outdoor Sit-Backer Canoe Seat
